footer.tagline: The platform for clubs that unifies bookings, members, and revenue in one system.
footer.tagline_short: Club platform for bookings, members, and finances.

hero.title: Club management with calm, style, and complete control.
hero.subtitle: Avaimo connects bookings, members, payments, contracts, and coaches in one surface that feels like a perfectly kept court: clear, elegant, instantly understood.

pains.title: What it looks like today
pains.0: Phone chains and WhatsApp chaos for free courts
pains.2: Open dues without a clear overview
pains.3: Coach payouts by hand and spreadsheets

outcomes.title: What it looks like with Avaimo
outcomes.0: Bookings and member management in one system

bookings.title: Bookings & courts
bookings.desc: Live calendar, collision checks, opening hours, blocked times.

members.title: Memberships
members.desc: Subscriptions, discounts, status, invitations, contract onboarding.

payments.title: Payments
payments.desc: Stripe, cash, vouchers, automatic payment status.

contracts.title: Contracts
contracts.desc: Digital signature, required fields, PDF export, revision.

training.title: Coaches & courses
training.desc: Coach sessions, courses, sessions, settlements, payouts.

results.title: Results
results.headline: Less admin work, more active members.
results.subheadline: Avaimo reduces routine work and delivers full courts, transparent finances, and a modern club image.

final.title: See your club dashboard live now.

hero.title: Everything a modern club needs.
hero.subtitle: Avaimo connects bookings, members, payments, contracts, and coaches in one platform. Modular features ensure each club sees only what it needs.

booking.title: Booking & court management
bullets: Blocked times, opening hours, special days
Guests and members in one flow

bullets: Discounts and free times per plan

bullets: Coach sessions with court and coach matching

security.title: Security & roles
security.desc: Role-based access, GDPR-compliant data storage, audit-proof logs.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.desc: Emails, reminders, automatic updates for outages and changes.

engagement.title: Engagement
engagement.desc: Leaderboards, match recaps, and community features for active members.

hero.title: Transparent packages for every club.
hero.subtitle: Our plans are modular. You can upgrade or add modules anytime.

pro.name: Pro
pro.desc: The standard for growing clubs with payments & coaches.

enterprise.name: Enterprise
enterprise.desc: for larger venues with multiple locations.

starter.name: Starter
starter.desc: for small clubs focused on bookings and members.

pricing.addons_subtitle: You can extend any plan with additional modules.

hero.title: Secure, traceable, GDPR-compliant.
hero.subtitle: Avaimo is built for clubs handling sensitive member data. Security is not optional, it is standard.
